articles.title: Juice mission launch LIVE | Europe to lift-off ambitious mission to Jupiter and its moon - India Today

articles.content: By India Today Science Desk: The European Space Agency (ESA) is set to conduct the launch of its ambitious mission to explore Jupiter and its large water-bearing moons. The Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer… [+1319 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Strickland
articles.title: The Juice mission will soon launch to Jupiter's icy ocean worlds - CNN
articles.description: The European Space Agency is about to send a spacecraft to explore Jupiter and three of its largest and most intriguing moons. The Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer missior, or Juice, is expected to launch on Thursday at 8:15 a.m ET.

articles.title: Germany foreign minister embarks on post-Macron 'damage control' in China trip - Reuters
articles.description: Germany's foreign minister begins a visit to China on Thursday aiming to reassert a common European Union policy toward Beijing days after remarks by French President Emmanuel Macron suggested disarray in the continent's approach to the rising superpower.

articles.title: The hunt for life on Jupiter's icy moons - The Economist
articles.description: Our podcast on science and technology. This week, our second episode on the hunt for life elsewhere—exploring the European Space Agency’s JUICE mission
